storyline: At the beginning of the game, Sina wakes up in a strange place, not remembering anything about himself. He has lost all his memory and, as a result, his identity. Will he ever get them back? Come into Sina's world to find out.
summary:
Love mysterious games? How about adventure and a bit of thriller and action? We have the right game for you. 41148 is a combination of all these genres in one.
Help Sina, the main character of the story, to remember his identity. In this journey, you will face horrible events, characters and places. So, be smart to solve the problems and be brave to reveal the mysteries.
